item1.question: How do I start a new sustainability report?
item1.answer: To start a new sustainability report, log in to your EcoReport account and click on the "New Report" button on your dashboard. Follow the step-by-step guide to input your organization's data and generate your report.

item2.question: Can I import data from previous years?
item2.answer: Yes, you can import data from previous years. Go to the "Data Management" section and select "Import Historical Data". You can then upload your past reports or data files in supported formats (CSV, Excel, etc.).

item3.question: How often should I update my sustainability metrics?
item3.answer: We recommend updating your sustainability metrics at least quarterly to maintain accurate and up-to-date reports. However, some organizations prefer monthly updates for more granular tracking. You can set custom reminders in your EcoReport settings.

GENERAL DISCLOSURES.title: GENERAL DISCLOSURES

MANAGEMENT AND PROCESS DISCLOSURES.title: MANAGEMENT AND PROCESS DISCLOSURES
MANAGEMENT AND PROCESS DISCLOSURES.description: This section is aimed at helping businesses demonstrate the structures, policies, and processes put in place towards adopting the NGRBC Principles and Core Elements.

PRINCIPLE WISE PERFORMANCE DISCLOSURE.title: PRINCIPLE WISE PERFORMANCE DISCLOSURE
PRINCIPLE WISE PERFORMANCE DISCLOSURE.description: This section is aimed at helping entities demonstrate their performance in integrating the Principles and Core Elements with key processes and decisions.

reporting-com.Question: Question
reporting-com.How does your organization track and mon: How does your organization track and monitor issues that are raised and addressed, and what measures are in place to ensure the effectiveness of these channels?
reporting-com.uses a centralized digital platform wher: uses a centralized digital platform where all issues are logged, categorized, and assigned to the appropriate teams for resolution. Each issue is given a unique identifier for easy reference and follow-up.
reporting-com.Regular monitoring processes are establi: Regular monitoring processes are established to review the status of each issue. This includes automated alerts for pending and overdue issues. Detailed reports are generated weekly and monthly to provide insights into issue resolution times, trends, and potential areas for improvement.
reporting-com.regularly collects feedback from stakeho: regularly collects feedback from stakeholders through surveys and direct feedback mechanisms. This feedback is analyzed to identify any gaps in the process, and necessary improvements are implemented.
reporting-com.To ensure the effectiveness of our issue: To ensure the effectiveness of our issue resolution channels,
reporting-com.The system is designed for continuous im: The system is designed for continuous improvement, incorporating feedback loops and regular audits to assess the performance of issue resolution channels. Training sessions are conducted for employees to keep them updated on best practices and new features of
reporting-com.Accountability is enforced through clear: Accountability is enforced through clear assignment of responsibilities and regular performance reviews.
reporting-com.ensures that all issues are addressed pr: ensures that all issues are addressed promptly and effectively, maintaining high standards of service and stakeholder satisfaction.
reporting-com.Transparency is maintained by providing: Transparency is maintained by providing stakeholders with access to issue status and resolution updates through
reporting-com.Number of non-employees in own workforce: Number of non-employees in own workforce
reporting-com.Based on HR contracts from datasource \": Based on HR contracts from datasource "VASPP BREVO - DMS - ID 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000", this is a possible answer:
reporting-com.As of the latest reporting period, the n: As of the latest reporting period, the number of non-employees in our organization's own workforce is approximately
reporting-com.The non-employees are classified into se: The non-employees are classified into several categories based on their roles and the duration of their engagement:
reporting-com.These non-employees play critical roles: These non-employees play critical roles in various departments, including IT, project management, and administrative support. Their contributions are essential to maintaining the efficiency and productivity of our operations.
reporting-com.system to track and monitor the engageme: system to track and monitor the engagement and performance of non-employees. This system ensures that all non-employees are adequately onboarded, their roles are clearly defined, and their contributions are regularly reviewed.
reporting-com.Our organization adheres to strict compl: Our organization adheres to strict compliance guidelines to ensure that the use of non-employees is transparent and aligns with regulatory requirements. Regular reports are generated to provide insights into the utilization and performance of non-employees.
reporting-com.By maintaining detailed records and impl: By maintaining detailed records and implementing robust monitoring systems, we ensure that the integration of non-employees into our workforce is effective and compliant with industry standards.
reporting-com.This includes contractors, consultants,: This includes contractors, consultants, and temporary staff who are integrated into our daily operations but are not directly employed by the organization.
reporting-com.Number of employees (head count or full-: Number of employees (head count or full-time equivalent)
reporting-com.As of the latest reporting period, the n: As of the latest reporting period, the number of employees (head count or full-time equivalent) in our organization is approximately
reporting-com.These employees play critical roles in v: These employees play critical roles in various departments, including IT, project management, human resources, and administrative support. Their contributions are essential to maintaining the efficiency and productivity of our operations.
reporting-com.system to track and monitor the engageme: system to track and monitor the engagement and performance of employees. This system ensures that all employees are adequately onboarded, their roles are clearly defined, and their contributions are regularly reviewed.
reporting-com.Our organization adheres to strict compl: Our organization adheres to strict compliance guidelines to ensure that the use of employees is transparent and aligns with regulatory requirements. Regular reports are generated to provide insights into the utilization and performance of employees.
reporting-com.By maintaining detailed records and impl: By maintaining detailed records and implementing robust monitoring systems, we ensure that the management of employees in our workforce is effective and compliant with industry standards.
reporting-com.How does your organization disclose the: How does your organization disclose the steps taken to gain insight into the perspectives of people within its own workforce who may be particularly vulnerable to impacts and/or marginalized?
reporting-com.The European Sustainability Reporting St: The European Sustainability Reporting Standards provide a framework for companies to report on their sustainability performance in compliance with EU regulations.
reporting-com.The Business Responsibility and Sustaina: The Business Responsibility and Sustainability Reporting framework is used by Indian companies to disclose their environmental, social, and governance performance
reporting-com.The Global Reporting Initiative offers i: The Global Reporting Initiative offers international standards for sustainability reporting, enabling organizations to communicate their impacts.
reporting-com.Start the reporting process for CSRD wit: Start the reporting process for CSRD with the ESRS standards
reporting-com.Start the reporting process for BRSR wit: Start the reporting process for BRSR with SEBI standards
reporting-com.Statistics of total questions answered,: Statistics of total questions answered, including not mandatory leadership indicators
reporting-com.Number of mandatory questions completed: Number of mandatory questions completed for compliance
reporting-com.Percentage of BRSR Section completed for: Percentage of BRSR Section completed for compliance

reporting-com.A stacked bar chart with a legend: A stacked bar chart with a legend

assessment.Please contact your Sustena administrato: Please contact your Sustena administrator for more details.
assessment.Are you sure you want to mark this topic: Are you sure you want to mark this topic as not material? Please provide a detailed description.
assessment.Are you sure you want to delete the asse: Are you sure you want to delete the assessment?
assessment.Name: Name
assessment.Describe how this topic has an impact on: Describe how this topic has an impact on your company or how your company has an impact on the environment
assessment.refers to how a particular topic or issu: refers to how a particular topic or issue influences the company's impact on the economy, environment, or society. This type of materiality considers the extent to which the company's activities or decisions contribute to or alleviate broader environmental, social, or economic challenges. In this context, the significance is determined by the potential consequences of the company's actions on external stakeholders, ecosystems, or societal structures.
assessment.is concerned with how a particular topic: is concerned with how a particular topic or issue affects the financial performance or value of the company. This includes factors that could impact the company's revenue, costs, assets, liabilities, or overall market value. The focus is on identifying issues that are significant enough to influence the financial decisions of investors, shareholders, and other financial stakeholders.
assessment.Does this topic have a positive or negat: Does this topic have a positive or negative impact?
assessment.Is this topic a chance or a risk: Is this topic a chance or a risk.
assessment.Is this an actual or a potential impact?: Is this an actual or a potential impact?
assessment.The \"Scale\" field refers to the extent: The "Scale" field refers to the extent or reach of the impact caused by a specific topic or issue. It evaluates how widespread the consequences of this issue are, considering both the geographical coverage (e.g., local, national, global) and the number of stakeholders or resources affected. The scale helps in understanding the magnitude of the impact, whether it affects a small group within a localized area or has broader implications across multiple regions or sectors.
assessment.The \"Scope\" field measures the breadth: The "Scope" field measures the breadth or range of the impact related to a specific topic or issue. It assesses how many areas of the company's operations, stakeholders, or activities are affected.
assessment.The \"Irremediability\" field evaluates: The "Irremediability" field evaluates the difficulty in reversing or mitigating the impact of a particular issue or topic. It considers how permanent or long-lasting the consequences are if the issue is not adequately addressed.
assessment.The \"Probability\" field assesses the l: The "Probability" field assesses the likelihood that a particular event, issue, or impact will occur. It helps to gauge the risk associated with the issue based on its anticipated frequency or likelihood.
assessment.The \"Scale\" field refers to the extent: The 'Scale' field refers to the extent or reach of the impact caused by a specific topic or issue...
assessment.The \"Scope\" field measures the breadth: The 'Scope' field measures the breadth or range of the impact related to a specific topic or issue...
assessment.The \"Irremediability\" field evaluates: The 'Irremediability' field evaluates the difficulty in reversing or mitigating the impact of a particular issue or topic...
assessment.The \"Probability\" field assesses the l: The 'Probability' field assesses the likelihood that a particular event, issue, or impact will occur...
